name: VSV Capital
description:
VSV Capital is Vietnam's first Accelerator and early-stage VC firm founded in 2014 to invest in technology startups.

In 2013, for the first time in Vietnam, the Ministry of Science and Technology and the Vietnamese Government created an initiative directed at stimulating the growth of technology startups in Vietnam. The project was called Vietnam Silicon Valley (or "Project Commercialization of Technology Following the Silicon Valley Model in Vietnam" in Vietnamese), and widely known as just VSV. By combining the Vietnamese entrepreneurial spirit and innovative nature with proven practices that Silicon Valley has to offer in startup acceleration and investment, it sought to create an ecosystem of innovation and technology commercialization in Vietnam. The project marked the beginning of a dynamic and exciting era for startup and entrepreneurship in Vietnam.

In 2014, the team behind Project VSV founded Vietnam Silicon Valley Accelerator, or VSVA, making it the first startup accelerator in Vietnam, to continue their mission in developing the Vietnam startup ecosystem. Over the past years, we have helped hundreds of entrepreneurs build their companies and raise millions of dollars in their next rounds of funding.

In 2019, to further draw attention to startups at the most highly potential but also highly underserved segment in Vietnam, we raised our first venture fund in addition to our accelerator fund, and started operating under the name VSV Capital.
